meanings.definition: Located in the center or middle
meanings.sent1: The central seat was the best spot to see the show.
meanings.sent2: The town square is a central meeting place for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cake's central layer was a surprise burst of flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the central light in the room of gloom.
meanings.sent5: The central idea of the story was easy to understand.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the main part of something
meanings.sent1: The central character in the story was brave and kind.
meanings.sent2: The central theme of the book was friendship.
meanings.sent3: The central ingredient in the recipe was love.
meanings.sent4: His central role in the play made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The central focus of the painting was a beautiful flower.

meanings.sent1: Water is central to our survival.
meanings.sent2: Good communication is central to a healthy relationship.
meanings.sent3: The central point of the argument was lost in the noise.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was central to his decision-making process.
meanings.sent5: The central rule of the game was to have fun.
